attributes.action: Stop the name change of the pornstar martini cocktail
attributes.additional_details: My kids deserve to grow up in a society where the name of a drink containing the word pornstar doesn’t offend people.
attributes.background: The cocktail we all love and know as the Pornstar martini has come under fire recently with complaints of the word “pornstar” due to this they are changing the name to “passion star martini” which just doesn’t float my boat.

rejection.details: The Government and Parliament are not responsible for naming cocktails.
